General.Name: Kwong Fong Industries Corp
General.Description: Kwong Fong Industries Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the information software service and real estate businesses in Taiwan. The company constructs commercial buildings and residential houses; operates and leases office buildings, retail spaces, and homes; and manages malls and properties. It also provides electronic information supply, asset management, investment, tourism, and securities investment consultant services. The company was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 97, Dunhua South Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan
